snippet.title: Tales from Candleforth - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Sarah's grandmother went missing a while ago, but one day, she finds clues that she might still be alive. As Sarah discovers new powers that only the women in her family can inherit, she adventures into a world of occultism, mystery and horror to uncover the secrets her family is hiding and discover the part she plays in all of it. Solve challenging puzzles and interact with a mysterious world to reveal the darkness of this twisted tale.

🍂 WISHLIST NOW 🍂 http://bit.ly/TalesfromCandleforth
Twitter: https://twitter.com/underthebedgms
Website: https://underthebedgames.com



© Under the Bed Games. 2023.
